languages.text: Технолитания из дальних уголков сектора Каликсис — в ее строках благословение Омниссии даруется варп-двигателю. Оказалось, что эта молитва благодатно влияет на услышавших ее псайкеров: слова о могучем механизме, обуздывающем Эмпиреи, дают проклятым веру в то, что их собственные ужасные способности можно обратить на благо Империума.

A tech-litany from the far reaches of the Calixis Sector bestowing a blessing of the Omnissiah upon the warp engine. The prayer was discovered to have a beneficial effect on the psykers who heard it: the words about the mighty, Empyrean-conquering mechanism filled those cursed souls with faith that their own heinous abilities could be turned to the benefit of the Imperium.
languages.original_text: Технолитания из дальних уголков сектора Каликсис — в ее строках благословение Омниссии даруется варп-двигателю. languages.text: Una tecnoletanía de las regiones más recónditas del sector Calixis, que otorga la bendición del Omnissiah al motor de disformidad. Se descubrió que la plegaria tenía efectos beneficiosos sobre los psíquicos que la escuchaban: las palabras sobre el poderoso mecanismo de conquista del Empíreo llenaban sus almas malditas de fe en que sus terribles capacidades pueden emplearse por el bien del Imperium.
languages.original_text: A tech-litany from the far reaches of the Calixis Sector bestowing a blessing of the Omnissiah upon the warp engine. The prayer was discovered to have a beneficial effect on the psykers who heard it: the words about the mighty, Empyrean-conquering mechanism filled those cursed souls with faith that their own heinous abilities could be turned to the benefit of the Imperium.

Se descubrió que la plegaria tenía efectos beneficiosos sobre los psíquicos que la escuchaban: las palabras sobre el poderoso mecanismo de conquista del Empíreo llenaban sus almas malditas de fe en que sus terribles capacidades pueden emplearse por el bien del Imperium.

languages.text: キャリクシス星域の遥か彼方からもたらされた技術的リタニアは、ワープエンジンに万機神の祝福を与える。この祈りは、それを聞いた異能者に有益な効果をもたらすことが判明した。エンピリアンを征服する強力なメカニズムを語るその言葉は、呪われた魂にその極悪非道な能力が帝国の利益につながるという信念を抱かせた。
languages.original_text: A tech-litany from the far reaches of the Calixis Sector bestowing a blessing of the Omnissiah upon the warp engine. The prayer was discovered to have a beneficial effect on the psykers who heard it: the words about the mighty, Empyrean-conquering mechanism filled those cursed souls with faith that their own heinous abilities could be turned to the benefit of the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: キャリクシス星域の遥か彼方からもたらされた技術的リタニアは、ワープエンジンに万機神の祝福を与える。この祈りは、それを聞いた異能者に有益な効果をもたらすことが判明した。エンピリアンを征服する強力なメカニズムを語るその言葉は、呪われた魂にその極悪非道な能力が帝国の利益につながるという信念を抱かせた。

languages.text: 这些科技祷词源自卡利西斯星区的遥远星区，可以将欧姆尼塞亚的祝福赐予亚空间引擎。人们发现，这段祷文同样会对灵能者产生积极的影响。祷词讲述着强大的机械装置征服至高天的传说，这些话语会让灵能者充满信心，让他们相信哪怕自己遭到了诅咒，也依然可以为帝国的福祉奋斗。
languages.original_text: A tech-litany from the far reaches of the Calixis Sector bestowing a blessing of the Omnissiah upon the warp engine. The prayer was discovered to have a beneficial effect on the psykers who heard it: the words about the mighty, Empyrean-conquering mechanism filled those cursed souls with faith that their own heinous abilities could be turned to the benefit of the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: 这些科技祷词源自卡利西斯星区的遥远星区，可以将欧姆尼塞亚的祝福赐予亚空间引擎。人们发现，这段祷文同样会对灵能者产生积极的影响。祷词讲述着强大的机械装置征服至高天的传说，这些话语会让灵能者充满信心，让他们相信哪怕自己遭到了诅咒，也依然可以为帝国的福祉奋斗。

languages.text: Eine Tech-Litanei aus den entlegenen Winkeln des Calixis-Sektors, die dem Warp-Triebwerk den Segen des Omnissiah gewährt. Es hat sich gezeigt, dass das Gebet eine positive Wirkung auf die Psioniker hat, die es gehört haben: Die Worte über den mächtigen, das Empyreum erobernden Mechanismus erfüllten diese verfluchten Seelen mit dem Glauben, dass sich ihre schändlichen Fähigkeiten zum Wohle des Imperiums einsetzen lassen.
languages.original_text: A tech-litany from the far reaches of the Calixis Sector bestowing a blessing of the Omnissiah upon the warp engine. The prayer was discovered to have a beneficial effect on the psykers who heard it: the words about the mighty, Empyrean-conquering mechanism filled those cursed souls with faith that their own heinous abilities could be turned to the benefit of the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: Eine Tech-Litanei aus den entlegenen Winkeln des Calixis-Sektors, die dem Warp-Triebwerk den Segen des Omnissiah gewährt. Es hat sich gezeigt, dass das Gebet eine positive Wirkung auf die Psioniker hat, die es gehört haben: Die Worte über den mächtigen, das Empyreum erobernden Mechanismus erfüllten diese verfluchten Seelen mit dem Glauben, dass sich ihre schändlichen Fähigkeiten zum Wohle des Imperiums einsetzen lassen.

languages.text: Technolitanie provenant des confins du secteur Calixis et conférant la bénédiction de l'Omnimessie au moteur Warp. La prière s'est avérée bénéfique aux psykers qui l'ont entendue : l'évocation du tout-puissant mécanisme capable de conquérir l'Empyrée a donné foi à ces âmes maudites en leurs capacités à mettre leurs odieuses compétences au service de l'Imperium.
languages.original_text: A tech-litany from the far reaches of the Calixis Sector bestowing a blessing of the Omnissiah upon the warp engine. The prayer was discovered to have a beneficial effect on the psykers who heard it: the words about the mighty, Empyrean-conquering mechanism filled those cursed souls with faith that their own heinous abilities could be turned to the benefit of the Imperium.

La prière s'est avérée bénéfique aux psykers qui l'ont entendue : l'évocation du tout-puissant mécanisme capable de conquérir l'Empyrée a donné foi à ces âmes maudites en leurs capacités à mettre leurs odieuses compétences au service de l'Imperium.

languages.text: Calixis Sektörü'nün en uzak köşelerinde duyulan bir tekno ilahi. Öteboyut motoruna Hermesih'in lütfunu bahşeder. Duanın ulaştığı ruhsezerlere faydalı etkileri olduğu keşfedilmiş. Gök Diyar'ı fethedecek denli kudretli mekanizmayı anlatan sözler, o lanetli ruhları inançla öylesine doldurmuş ki habis kabiliyetlerinin İmparatorluk yararına kullanılmasını mümkün kılmış.
languages.original_text: A tech-litany from the far reaches of the Calixis Sector bestowing a blessing of the Omnissiah upon the warp engine. The prayer was discovered to have a beneficial effect on the psykers who heard it: the words about the mighty, Empyrean-conquering mechanism filled those cursed souls with faith that their own heinous abilities could be turned to the benefit of the Imperium.
